title: MediChoice Laboratory Coats, Premium, Disposable, Anti-Static, Three-Pocket, Knit Cuff, 5-Snap, Spunbond Meltblown Spunbond, Medium, Blue (Case of 25)
features: Antistatic to <10kv for static discharge, static jump and static decay
Made of fluid resistant SMS material
Two color options: blue and white
Meets OSHA Standard 29 CFR for protection of employees from bloodborne pathogens
description: MediChoice Premium Disposable Lab Coats have anti-static properties for static discharge, static jump and static decay. The blue suits are constructed of a soft non-woven SMS material, and they come with five-button front, knit cuffs, open collar, and three convenient pockets. Sizes range XXXS to XXL. MediChoice delivers safety, economy, and function. MediChoice is Owens & Minor's brand of medical-surgical products and durable medical equipment that is expanding to meet the changing needs of healthcare. MediChoice, your choice for quality, value and unmatched service. Search MediChoice for additional product offerings.
details: {"Product Dimensions": "15.7 x 13.4 x 10.6 inches; 6.65 Pounds", "Date First Available": "March 17, 2015", "Manufacturer": "MediChoice", "Country of Origin": "China"}
